description.value: Living with the bare necessities isn't terribly hard for someone who has defied death, and like a cockroach, you always know how to survive. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Subsist] during downtime, the DC for your skill check is reduced by 2. You don't need a minimum proficiency rank to Subsist in unusual environments, nor do you take a â€“5 penalty if you Subsist after 8 hours or less of exploration.

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web
